articles.title: Nancy Mace demands answers from Hertz over AI scanners charging hundreds of dollars for minor scratches
articles.summary: House Rep. Nancy Mace (R-SC) wants answers from Hertz over its artificial intelligence-powered scanners.

articles.title: Gaxos.AI (GXAI) Shares Pull Back After Surge On New AI Platform Launch
articles.summary: Shares of Gaxos.AI are pulling back Wednesday morning. The stock soared yesterday following the company's announcement of its new artificial intelligence platform.

articles.title: Summer US IPO Thrills Set Stage for Crypto and AI-Led September
articles.summary: Companies touting their artificial intelligence and crypto-sector ties are speeding up their IPO timelines, after triple-digit first-day pops became a regular feature in this summerâ€™s sizzling US market for new issues.

articles.title: Asian shares retreat, tracking tech losses on Wall Street
articles.summary: Asian shares have retreated, tracking a decline on Wall Street led by technology shares including Nvidia and other stars that have been riding the mania surrounding artificial-intelligence.
